languages.text: "Ты же знаешь, что он обречен. Если я убью его — мы получим настоящего союзника, и наши шансы спастись вырастут".

traits.locale_text: "Ты же знаешь, что он обречен. Если я убью его — мы получим настоящего союзника, и наши шансы спастись вырастут".

languages.text: "You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."
languages.original_text: "Ты же знаешь, что он обречен. Если я убью его — мы получим настоящего союзника, и наши шансы спастись вырастут".

traits.locale_text: "You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."
"You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."
"You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."
"You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."
"You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."

languages.text: “你我都很清楚，他的努力徒劳无功。只要我杀了他，我们就会争取到一位合适的盟友，让我们更有机会逃出这个地方。”
languages.original_text: "You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."

traits.locale_text: “你我都很清楚，他的努力徒劳无功。只要我杀了他，我们就会争取到一位合适的盟友，让我们更有机会逃出这个地方。”

languages.text: 「いずれにしてもこの男は終わりだ、お前だってわかっているだろう。この場で彼を殺せば適切な味方を獲得し、脱出できる可能性が上がる」
languages.original_text: "You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."

traits.locale_text: 「いずれにしてもこの男は終わりだ、お前だってわかっているだろう。この場で彼を殺せば適切な味方を獲得し、脱出できる可能性が上がる」

languages.text: «Sabe tan bien como yo que está condenado. Si le mato, obtendremos un aliado útil y, por tanto, una mejor probabilidad de escapar».
languages.original_text: "You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."

traits.locale_text: «Sabe tan bien como yo que está condenado. Si le mato, obtendremos un aliado útil y, por tanto, una mejor probabilidad de escapar».

languages.text: « Vous savez aussi bien que moi qu'il est condamné. Si je le tue, nous gagnerons un allié de poids et augmenterons nos chances de nous en sortir. »
languages.original_text: "You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez aussi bien que moi qu'il est condamné. Si je le tue, nous gagnerons un allié de poids et augmenterons nos chances de nous en sortir. »

languages.text: "Ihr wisst genauso gut wie ich, dass er untergehen wird. Wenn ich ihn töte, erhalten wir einen echten Verbündeten und verbessern dadurch unsere Fluchtchancen."
languages.original_text: "You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst genauso gut wie ich, dass er untergehen wird. Wenn ich ihn töte, erhalten wir einen echten Verbündeten und verbessern dadurch unsere Fluchtchancen."

languages.text: "Ölüme mahkûm olduğunu ikimiz de biliyoruz. Onu öldürürsem buradan kurtulma şansımızı artırırım, kendimize sağlam bir müttefik edinmiş oluruz."
languages.original_text: "You know as well as I do that he is doomed. If I kill him, we will gain a proper ally and thus improve our chances of escaping."

traits.locale_text: "Onun ölüme mahkûm olduğunu sen de benim kadar biliyorsun. Onu öldürürsem buradan kurtulma şansımızı artırırım ve kendimize sağlam bir müttefik edinmiş oluruz."
